Enlightened Spirit

Prerequisite: Goliath, stone’s endurance racial power, any psionic class
Benefit: You can substitute Constitution for Strength when making Athletics checks.
    In addition, when you use stone’s endurance while you have at least 1 power point, you also gain a +2 bonus to Will until the end of your next turn.

Published in Dragon Magazine 389.
